title: Fuck These Fuckin Fascists by The Muslims (NC)
lyrics:
[Intro]
Fuck these fuckin' fascists
They can kiss our asses

[Verse 1]
I've been thinkin' 'bout my whole situation
I don't know about you but
Where and when to fuck, get fucked, did ya?
But I know that it's just you who hated
You can't blame your daughter
You can't shame me

[Chorus]
Fuck these fuckin' fascists
Fuck their family and friends
If they defend a fuckin' fascist
They can fuck off 'til they're dead

[Verse 2]
I've been watchin' you roll up to the Pinhook
You been hangin' in with all these other fuckin' crusty punks
But I see that swastika on your jacket
I ain't after you buddy but I'm 'bout to

[Chorus]
Fuck these fuckin' fascists
Fuck their family and friends
If they defend a fuckin' fascist
They can fuck off 'til thеy're dead
[Bridge]
Why try to hide (if you'rе really for them)
Why white ass pride (show your colors or you're dead)
Fuckin' why?

[Chorus]
Fuck these fuckin' fascists (Fuck these fascists)
Fuck their family and friends (And their friends)
If they defend a fuckin' fascist (Their ancestors)
They can fuck off 'til they're dead (And all their kids)

Fuck these fuckin' fascists (Fuck these fascists)
Fuck their family and friends (And their friends)
If they defend a fuckin' fascist (Their ancestors)
They can fuck off 'til they're dead (And all their kids)

Fuck these fuckin' fascists (Fuck these fascists)
Fuck their family and friends (And their friends)
If they defend a fuckin' fascist (Their ancestors)
They can fuck off 'til they're dead (And all their kids)

Fuck off and die!
